name: Yun Jin
desc:
"Stage Lucida" Yun Jin

Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color> , attaches <color=#ffffff>Shield of Swirling Clouds</color> to this character and <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> : <color=#ffffff>Spear Flourish</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)
<color=#ece5d8>Shield of Swirling Clouds</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
While preparing this Skill: Grant 2 <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> points to the character to which this is attached.
<color=#ece5d8>Spear Flourish</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . If you have <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> ed or used at least 1 card for <color=#ffffff>Tune</color> this Round, this deals +1 DMG.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , creates 3 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Tune</color>
Discard Action Cards from Hand to initiate Elemental Tuning

value.name: Decorous Harmony
value.desc:
Yun Jin: Decorous Harmony

"Strike as one!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Yun Jin
value.desc: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc:
"Stage Lucida" Yun Jin

Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"A friendly game of cards with you during a moment of leisure. Truly, an excellent choice."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Yun Jin's deck specializes in enhancing characters' Normal Attacks, and she can also unleash more powerful attacks when she has relatively few cards in her Hand.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc:
"Stage Lucida" Yun Jin

Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc:
"Blazing Riff" Xinyan

Time to rock!

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc:

Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.

customize.desc:
Yun Jin: Decorous Harmony

"Strike as one!"

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Decorous Harmony
customize.desc:
Yun Jin: Decorous Harmony

"Strike as one!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"It seems that understanding the principles of this game shall require more careful consideration... Oh, you'd like to go for another round? Please bear with me, then."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Yun Jin" starts with the Talent Card "Decorous Harmony" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
